document_data.name: Verner
document_data.mainbody: '''Verner''' was a [[halfling]] youth from the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Harried in Hillsfar|9}}
document_data.History:
Verner lived with nine other non-[[human]] children in [[Madame Delilah's Home for Orphaned Children]] in [[Hillsfar]] until First Lord [[Torin Nomerthal]] proclaimed again the [[Great Law of Humanity]], expelling all non-humans. Luckily, Verner and the others were housed by [[Ebenz Farbough]] and [[Bea Farbough]], two farmers without children, in a farmhouse near the city.

Verner lived there for two years, developing a bond with the goat [[Jovee]]. ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Jovee was in an unusual state. Some adventurers who happened to come near the farmhouse were asked to help but Jovee give birth to [[demon]]ic goats.{{Cite adventurers league/Harried in Hillsfar|10}}
